rules.description: SpaceFN: Space+[ijkl] to Up, Left, Down, Right
SpaceFN: Space+u to Start of Word, Space+o to End of Word
SpaceFN: Space+h to Page Up, Space+n to Page Down
SpaceFN: Space+y to Home, Space+p to End
SpaceFN Delete: Space+[df] to Delete/Backspace
SpaceFN Delete: Space+[er] to Opt+Delete/Backspace
SpaceFN Delete: Space+Shift+[er] to Command+Delete/Backspace
SpaceFN Move Line: Space+[w, s] to move line Up/Down
SpaceFN Command: Space+[q, t, a, z, x, c, v, b, m, ','] to Command
SpaceFN Command: Space+[escape] to Command
CtrlCommand: control + [w, r, t, i, o, p] to Command + [w, r, t, i, o, p]
CtrlCommand: control + [a, s, f, h, l] to Command + [a, s, f, h, l]
SpaceFN: Space enables SpaceFN mode (see: https://geekhack.org/index.php?topic=51069.0)
SpaceFN Launch Apps: Space+[1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6] to Launch VSCode, Chrome, Rider, Slack, Terminal, Zalo
SpaceFN: Space enables SpaceFN mode (see: https://geekhack.org/index.php?topic=51069.0)
SpaceFN: Space+[ijkl] to Up, Left, Down, Right
SpaceFN: Space+u to Start of Word, Space+o to End of Word
SpaceFN: Space+y to Home, Space+p to End
SpaceFN: Space+h to Page Up, Space+n to Page Down
SpaceFN Delete: Space+[df] to Delete/Backspace
SpaceFN Delete: Space+[er] to Opt+Delete/Backspace
SpaceFN Delete: Space+Shift+[er] to Command+Delete/Backspace
SpaceFN Launch Apps: Space+[1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6] to Launch VSCode, Chrome, Rider, Slack, Terminal, Zalo
SpaceFN Move Line: Space+[w, s] to move line Up/Down
SpaceFN Command: Space+[backquote] to Command
SpaceFN Command: Space+[q, t, a, z, x, c, v, b, m, ','] to Command
